articles.author: Austen Hufford, Melanie Evans
articles.title: The Wall Street Journal: Coronavirus outbreak causes uncertainty in the medical-mask market
articles.description: China is one of the world’s top producers of medical masks.
articles.content:
Chinese officials are buying up medical masks in the virus-wracked country from factories that typically supply hospitals around the world, forcing manufacturers to boost output globally and hospitals to ration supplies.
Masks are essential protective gear f… [+958 chars]
